name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Build Engineer with a strong focus on project management, resource planning, and risk management, leveraging 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in quality assurance and continuous improvement methodologies to ensure compliance with health and safety standards. Skilled in budgeting and site audits, emphasizing team collaboration and effective problem-solving to drive successful project outcomes.
Demonstrated expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside hands-on experience in frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms and deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, along with a strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD pipelines.
